allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Restore GitHub Actions workflow for deployment

Re-add the deploy.yml workflow that was accidentally deleted during merge.
This workflow builds and deploys the site to GitHub Pages.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix TypeScript ref type error in Robot3D component

Initialize meshRef with null to match expected ref type.
This fixes the build error in GitHub Actions.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Configure Next.js for static export to GitHub Pages

Add output: ''export'' to enable static site generation.
Add images.unoptimized for compatibility with static hosting.
This creates the /out folder needed for GitHub Pages deployment.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
